mapper.select: SELECT wm.water_meter_id, wm.name, wm.description, wm.tariff, mt.meter_type_id, mt.type, i.indicator_id, i.date, i.tariff_per_date, i.value, i.is_paid, i.is_published, a.address_id, a.city, a.street, a.building, a.apartment FROM watermeter wm LEFT OUTER JOIN indicator i on wm.water_meter_id = i.water_meter_id LEFT OUTER JOIN address a on wm.address_id = a.address_id LEFT OUTER JOIN meter_type mt on wm.meter_type_id = mt.meter_type_id WHERE wm.water_meter_id = #{waterMeterId}

SELECT wm.water_meter_id, wm.name, wm.description, wm.tariff, mt.meter_type_id, mt.type FROM watermeter wm LEFT OUTER JOIN address a on wm.address_id = a.address_id LEFT OUTER JOIN meter_type mt on wm.meter_type_id = mt.meter_type_id WHERE a.address_id = #{addressId}
SELECT wm.water_meter_id, wm.name, wm.description, wm.tariff, mt.meter_type_id, mt.type FROM watermeter wm LEFT OUTER JOIN meter_type mt on wm.meter_type_id = mt.meter_type_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO watermeter(name, description, tariff, address_id, meter_type_id) VALUES(#{name}, #{description}, #{tariff}, #{address.addressId}, #{meterType.meterTypeId})
